esectable (localized) bile duct cancer     - Unresectable, metastatic, or recurrent bile duct cancer
                
                
                    The results of diagnostic and staging tests are used to find out if cancer cells have spread.
                    The process used to find out if cancer has spread to other parts of the body is called staging. For bile duct cancer, the information gathered from tests and procedures is used to plan treatment, including whether the tumor can be
